page.title: 01INNERLEITHEN TO WALKERBURN
page.content: Pos. Beneath hills in beautiful area where Leithen joins Tweed. Pop. 2500 Most employed manufacture cashmere intarsia knitwear for export. Spinning manmade fibres Ceramic tiles, Quilts,Plastics,Sawmill,Chemicals. 5 farms in our area raise sheep,dairy and beef cattle or grass and turnips. Hourly bus EDINR _ MELROSE Courier bus on scenic route. 1h EDINR. AIRPORT. Variety of ex. shops Homemade Icecream Caberston Farm Shop. Good Restaurants. St.Ronan's Primary School 220 pupils including Nursery and Special Educ. Fish Trout / Salmon.Golf.Bowls.Tennis Putting. Amateur Opera. Chess. Riding. Health Care Team at Clinic Huntlyburn Hosp. Opens 1988. Old Folks Home. HISTORICAL Site of Roman Camp Ancient hill forts. New Stone Age Terraces. Attend Cleikum Ceremonies St.Ronan's Border Games. Visit St.Ronan's Wells
